resources.string: In this appointment application, you can create appointment, search for appointment, and view any appointment book.
In this application, you can create new appointment, search appointments, and view appointment book.

In this page, you can create new appointment. Enter name, description, begin time and end time of an appointment, then click "create appointment" button. You can print out the latest added appointment by clicking "print it on screen" button

In this page, you can search appointment between begin and end time. Enter the name of appointment owner, begin time and end time. If there exists appointment(s) that belong to the owner name and that happens between begin and end times, result will print out below.
in this page, you can view all the appointments that belong to one person. Enter the name below.
